front.title: Link Characteristic Information for IP Mobility Problem Statement

abstract.t: This document discusses the problem space related to frequent changesin the local link or sub-path characteristics of a mobile node due tovarious reasons such as vertical handovers and the delivery of thesub-path characteristic information from a mobile node to its peernodes. The purpose of this document is to define the scope andrequirements for possible future work on a generic sub-pathcharacteristic information delivery mechanism for optimizing IPmobility performance and reducing the implications that significantchanges in the local link or sub-path characteristics tend to createto the transport and application protocol behaviour by altering theend-to-end path properties.
